Name: test_CMS_11_11_0_Reply_To_Program_Step_Thread
Description:
Test Case 211: Verify ability to reply to program step thread from notification.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Click on the first notification entry
7. Reply to the program step thread
8. Verify reply functionality works correctly

Name: test_CMS_11_8_0_Notification_Status_After_Page_Reload
Description:
Test Case 208: Verify notification status persists after page reload.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Mark a notification as read/unread
5. Reload the page
6. Verify notification moved to correct tab
7. Verify status persists after reload

Name: test_NAF_7_3_0_Logout_of_AdminPanel
Description:
Test that a user with admin role can successfully log out from the CMS.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Click the logout button
7. Verify that the user is logged out

Name: test_NAF_12_4_0_delete_edit_own_and_others_post
Description:
Test Case 238: Verify Admin/Coach Can Edit Own Post
Test Case 239: Verify Admin/Coach Can Delete Own Post
Test Case 242: Verify Admin/Coach Can Edit Own Reply
Test Case 243: Verify Admin/Coach Can Delete Own Reply

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Create a new post with image
5. Publish the post and verify creation
6. Edit the post with new content
7. Add a comment to the post
8. Delete the comment
9. Delete the post

Name: test_NAF_9_9_0_Popular_Nutrition_Tags
Description:
Verify user can toggle Popular or Nutrition tag when creating a program

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Verify Popular or Nutrition tag is not selected by default
6. Toggle Popular or Nutrition tag
7. Verify tag is selected
8. Toggle Popular or Nutrition tag
9. Verify tag is not selected
6. Verify program is successfully deleted
